tokens.name: OnlyClaws / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **BUY/SELL PRESSURE:** Ratio of 1.4 (balanced) + strong recent buying momentum (155 buys vs. 145 sells) indicates conservative BUY.  
- **LIMIT ORDER:** Medium volatility (34.9% price change) → -2% to -5% (entered near market).  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Medium volume ($5,910) → +10% to +20% (midpoint at +15%).  
- **STOP LOSS:** Medium volatility → -8% to -15% (midpoint at -8%).  
- **TIME FRAME:** Stable momentum + medium volume → 2h to 6h (short-term holding).  

**Key Factors:** Recent trade flow dominance (56–59% buys in all thirds) and accelerating buying pressure justify aggressive entry with tighter stop-loss.
